name.namePart: San Antonio Symphony Orchestra Percussion Ensemble.

mods.note: Ceremony of Psalms is a collection of 9 psalms commissioned by Trinity University for its 1969 centennial year. This performance was at Margarite B. Parker Chapel by the Trinity University Choir, Claude Zetty, conductor, Campbell Smith, organ, and the percussion ensemble of the San Antonio Symphony. There were two centennial celebration concerts, November 9 or 16, 1969.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
Physical rights and copyright are retained by the LSU Libraries. Permission to reproduce or publish must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: William J. Thornton Papers, Mss. 2012, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
